JobTitle: Program Manager - MC-130J - Special Operations Forces
JobFullDesc: Description:Special Operations Forces (SOF) Global Logistics Support Services (GLSS) is looking for a Program Manager to join our MC-130J program team at our Ft. Walton Beach, FL facility.  SOF GLSS segment supports the customer with a quick turnaround of activities from the proposal through Task Order (TO) execution. This program is critical to the success of US service men and women deployed throughout the world. Our mission is to rapidly and properly equip the SOF community and its war fighters with the best possible systems and equipment anywhere in the world.The team is seeking a high potential and high performing leader with relevant Program Management experience and demonstrated ability to collaborate pro-actively within diverse teams is needed to support program performance execution excellence.  This support is likely to span the entire gamut of program execution, including but not limited to fundamental program management tasks such as program planning, risk/opportunity management, cost/schedule integration using EVMS techniques, and the effective use of metrics to monitor program performance throughout the entire program lifecycle.Basic Qualifications:• Creative thinking, “can-do” attitude• Excellent verbal/written communication skills• Excellent inter-personal and skills; demonstrated ability to form effective relationships with diverse teams to deliver positive results• Ability to work independently and objectively to assess program performance and risk of a wide variety of program typesDesired Skills:• Program Management and/or Technical leadership experience on development programs• Program Management and/or Technical leadership experience on production programs• Subcontract Management experience• Knowledge / Experience with C-130J and modification programs• Knowledge / Experience working with SOCOM / SOFSA• A demonstrated ability to recognize, predict and manage technical, quality and production risk.BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:job.QualificationsLockheed Martin is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
